casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Geroy FISHER. No. 222A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Hal F. Askins, Special Deputy Attorney General, William D. Kenerly, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of May 2007 by Defendant for Appointment of Counsel:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2007."
